full_summary:
### Flight Sciences Technical Investigation & Engineering Services (FS TIES)
#### Solicitation Number: W8485-23-SC09
#### Description:
The Department of National Defence (DND) invites bids for professional engineering services including technical investigations and engineering support for flight sciences.

#### Background:
The DND's Directorate of Technical Airworthiness and Engineering Support (DTAES) requires services of senior and junior engineers or technicians to examine aircraft performance, specifications, and capabilities.

#### Scope of Work:
The scope of work includes examining aircraft performance, specifications, and capabilities for possible improvements or proposed changes to Royal Canadian Air Force (RCAF) aircraft or other aircraft operated by DND. The contractor must maintain a secure electronic Management Information System (MIS) to record and store all produced items, procured on behalf of Canada, or provided by Canada.

#### Security Clearance:
Security Clearance FSC – Secret is required for supplier and Resource Security Clearance Secret is required.

#### Estimated Level of Effort:
The estimated level of effort will be:
* Senior Engineer: 800 hours per year
* Junior Engineer or Technician: 180 hours per year

#### Service Duration:
The duration of the contract will be 3 years, with the possibility of two (2) additional irrevocable option years to extend the term.

#### Geographic Location:
The locations for work execution are:
* National Capital Region
* Contractor's facilities

#### Tendering Procedure:
The tendering procedure is competitive, with open bidding. Suppliers can submit a bid.

#### Evaluation Criteria:
The LOWEST PRICE will be the evaluation criterion.

#### Contact Information:
Contact Khushbu Bakshi at:
E-mail: [DapServicesBidReceiving-DoaServicesReceptionDesSoumissions@forces.gc.ca](mailto:DapServicesBidReceiving-DoaServicesReceptionDesSoumissions@forces.gc.ca)
Phone: (819) 939-8468
Fax: 819-939-5042
#### Evaluation Method:
 LOWEST PRICE
#### Closing Date and Time:
2024-06-14T14:00:00

The rewritten entry is now around 300 words. If more information is needed, I can add it while keeping the same format. Let me know if there is anything else I can assist with.
